product_name: Big Eyed Pro Frog 4 Pack Kit
long_description: These NEW Big Eyed Pro Frog lures are truly deadly on bass and pike. They feature weedless patented PROTEC weedguard, super sharp OWNER hook, POLYCORE Dual Density heavyweight body. Other features include oversize 3-D eyes, dazzling real-life holographic colors, super durable elastic legs and hook down design to keep fish caught.   These new Pro Frogs cast 70-90 feet, always land on their belly with the eyes just above the water. They can be twitched, skittered or "walk the dog". Nicely packed in a reusable lure case, this 4-pack is an incredible value at just $25.29.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
